Template.TargetFolderHint: Choose the ViViVerse/software/package folder as target folder.

MacroDefinition.Name: PACKAGE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the package. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: UND_PACKAGE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the package without prefix like 'vvv_'. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: COPYRIGHT
MacroDefinition.Description: The copyright string for the file headers.

MacroDefinition.Name: COMPANY
MacroDefinition.Description: The company name (for the file information on Windows).

MacroDefinition.Name: MOD_PROD_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the module as product (for the file information on Windows).

MacroDefinition.Name: CREATION_DATE
MacroDefinition.Description: The date of the creation of the package.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_ORG_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package organelle folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_INT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package interface folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_CFG_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package configuration folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_CFG_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package configuration project used in the Windows vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_COLL_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package organelle collection folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_COLL_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package collection project used in the Windows vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_COMN_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package organelle common folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_MSG_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package message project used in the Windows vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_SYM_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package symbiosis project used in the Windows vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_MOD_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package module folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_MOD_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package module project used in the Windows vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_TEST_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package test project used in the Windows vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: LNX_ORG_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package organelle folder used in the Linux sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_INT_C_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package interface c folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_INT_LANG_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package interface language folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_INT_TEST_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package interface test folder used in the Windows sln file of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: LNX_MOD_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the package module project used in the Linux vcxproj and sln files of msbuild.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_INT_STAT_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the static library c interface project.

MacroDefinition.Name: WIN_INT_DLL_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the dynamic library c interface project.

MacroDefinition.Name: DOT_NET_SHD_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the .NET shared item interface project.

MacroDefinition.Name: DOT_NET_TEST_PROJECT_GUID
MacroDefinition.Description: The id of the .NET test interface project.
